nodes.text: Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies was an Utapaun company in operation during the time of the Clone Wars.

It specialized in self-constructing armament factories and produced a number of vehicles and vessels for the Confederacy of Independent Systems after the Techno Union conquered Utapau. Based out of the Grand Hall of the Traders' Guild in Pau City, they churned out hastily-built interceptors to battle Republic and native forces during the Battle of Utapau. The company was part of the Techno Union, which used its self-replicating technology to build factories that could grow throughout the Utapaun landscape.
